graph_title: Mortality rate attributed to household and ambient air pollution

uwagi: Proxy indicator, available within the Polish public statistics. An original indicator, adopted by the UN for monitoring target 3.9 of the 2030 Agenda is 3.9.1 Mortality rate attributed to household and ambient air pollution.
